name: Hit the Heater!
description:
If you live in Benelux (The Netherlands, belguim and luxembourg), you can buy the heaters at biobranderhaard.nl

It's my first game i post online, so feel free to say what i can do better next time. There is a glitch that you need to press escape after restarting the level and i just cannot make it work. It's a short game about hitting heaters. Hope you enjoy it!
